name: Award
title: Award
description: An award given to a person, organization, creative work etc.

fields.name: awardType
fields.title: Award Type
fields.description: The type of this award (trophy, title, certificate, medal, ribbon etc).

fields.name: dateAwarded
fields.title: Date Awarded
fields.description: The date on which this award was given.

fields.name: awardedBy
fields.title: Awarded By
fields.description: The person or organization that gave this award.

fields.name: object
fields.title: Object
fields.description: The object (person, organization, creative work etc) which was been awarded.
